page.title: 08EDUCATION IN TYSOE
page.content:
TYSOE PLAYGROUP - held 3 mornings per week for 3-4 year olds. Supervisor and helper paid to run the group, overall running and planning are by a Committee, who fund raise to buy equippment. Hall is suitable for 23 children, average attendance is 18. One morning per week is 'Mother & Toddler's' group.
TYSOE PRIMARY SCHOOL Church of England Caters for 137 pupils aged 4+ - 11+ years from villages of Tysoe, Oxhill, Whatcote, Radway, and Edgehill. Pupils brought to Tysoe by bus. Five fulltime teachers, including headmaster, 1 part-time teacher 3 days, and a helper. There are 5 classes - 2 infants and 3 junior. School boasts a swimming pool. Pupils proceed to Kineton High School or to the Grammar School, Stratford.
